name: Microsoft Planner - Standard Export
description: Microsoft Planner Excel export format saved as CSV

rules.milestone: Progress == 'Completed' and Due Date is empty
rules.meeting: Task Name contains 'meeting' or 'standup' or 'sync' or Progress == 'Recurring'

notes: Microsoft Planner uses Bucket Names for organization (map to lane). Labels are semicolon-separated. Task IDs are unique identifiers.
